title: Dross Scorpion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Colorless) each night.
- (2): Attack another player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Whenever you kill someone, you may choose a player the next day, which may be yourself. Grant them Roleblock Immunity for the following night.

desc:
Post 1146
*They skitter out of the mists to consume fresh kill before Mephidross has a chance to corrode it away.*
